name: partner-portal-demo
description: A Demo of a B2B Partner portal for booking management

scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run format:check
scripts.typecheck: tsc -p app/backend/tsconfig.json --noEmit && tsc -p app/frontend/tsconfig.json --noEmit && tsc -p packages/shared/tsconfig.json --noEmit
scripts.openapi:generate: npm run generate:openapi --workspace=app/backend && npm run generate:client --workspace=app/backend && npm run generate:client --workspace=app/frontend
